medipy.io.dicom.routing¶

This module contains a DICOM routing engine which applies rules to datasets. Each rule contains conditions and actions: if all conditions are met, then the actions are applied on the dataset.

The following conditions are available :
  • AlwaysTrue
  • AlwaysFalse
  • And
  • Or
  • Not
  • ElementMatch
The following actions are available :
  • SetElement
  • DeleteElement
  • EmptyElement
  • SaveDataSet

The following example modifies datasets if they match the criteria, and saves the modified datasets to a directory.

# Get some data sets (e.g. from a PACS)
datasets = []

conditions = [
    medipy.io.dicom.routing.ElementMatch("patients_name", "Doe^John")
]

actions = [
    medipy.io.dicom.routing.EmptyElement("patients_name"),
    medipy.io.dicom.routing.SetElement("patient_id", "12345"),
    medipy.io.dicom.routing.EmptyElement("patients_birth_date"),
    medipy.io.dicom.routing.SetElement("study_id", "FOO"),
    medipy.io.dicom.routing.SaveDataSet("/some/where", "hierarchical"),
]

rule = medipy.io.dicom.routing.Rule(condition, actions)

for dataset in datasets :
    rule(dataset)
class medipy.io.dicom.routing.Action¶

Base class for all routing actions. All concrete derived classes must implement the __call__ method.

class medipy.io.dicom.routing.SetElement(tag, value)¶

Set an element in the dataset, inserting it if it does not exist.

class medipy.io.dicom.routing.DeleteElement(tag)¶

Remove an element from a dataset. If the element is not in the dataset, nothing happens.

class medipy.io.dicom.routing.EmptyElement(tag, vr=None)¶

Set an element in the dataset to an empty value. If the element is not present in the dataset, it is inserted.

The VR of the tag MUST NOT be one of AT, FL, FD, SL, SS, UL, US

class medipy.io.dicom.routing.SaveDataSet(root, mode='flat')¶

Save the dataset to a file. The root directory must be empty the first time this rule is called.

This action is thread-safe when called on different data-sets.

mode can be either "flat" or "hierarchical".

class medipy.io.dicom.routing.Condition¶

Base class for all routing conditions. All concrete derived classes must implement the __call__ method.

class medipy.io.dicom.routing.AlwaysTrue¶

Condition which is always True.

class medipy.io.dicom.routing.AlwaysFalse¶

Condition which is always False.

class medipy.io.dicom.routing.And(*args)¶

And-combination of several conditions.

class medipy.io.dicom.routing.Or(*args)¶

Or-combination of several conditions.

class medipy.io.dicom.routing.Not(child)¶

Inverse of a condition.

class medipy.io.dicom.routing.ElementMatch(tag, value)¶

Test if an element in a dataset matches a value.

class medipy.io.dicom.routing.Rule(condition, actions, enabled=True)¶

Apply actions on a dataset if it matches a condition
